column4: Hi there. How much can I trust someone who has a ppa archive at lauchpad. I need glusterfs 2 for hardy and I have found one ppa archive having it https://launchpad.net/~onestone/+archive/ppa for user onestone but how much can I trust this source?
I need to use this package in a production environment
as much as you trust any other repo, there could be anything in the package, it could be fine, or not, its the risk of ppa
usually they are completly fine, but the internet is weird and wonderful and you are right to be wary
